notes.title: Paying Today
notes.details: By 5pm today I intend to pay for my new apartment

notes.title: Playing Tennis
notes.details: So tomorrow by 10am I would be playing the lawn tennis with my friends Engr Ese and Courage

notes.title: Going shopping
notes.details: I would be grocery shopping for my imaginary wife today, and I just hope she would love these things I am buying now.

notes.title: Vision 2023
notes.details: I've decided to use the 52 Saturdays in this year to learn Solidity and Web3.0 development, the goal is to be a full blown Web3.0 developer come 2023.

notes.title: Surprise Surprise for mommy
notes.details: Hey! tomorrow is pay day, I promise to use my money wisely as usual only that this time I would be buying my mom a car. Shhhhhh!!! do not tell her, its a secrete
